thread.title: VOTE: Did Beyoncé Actually Tell Us About Her Twin Pregnancy Weeks Ago In This Christmas Video??
thread.title_full: VOTE: Did Beyoncé Actually Tell Us About Her Twin Pregnancy Weeks Ago In This Christmas Video??

author: Perez Hilton
title: VOTE: Did Beyoncé Actually Tell Us About Her Twin Pregnancy Weeks Ago In This Christmas Video??
text:
Beyoncé left no room for interpretation with her announcement that she was pregnant with twins . 
But before that Instagram proclamation, there was no evidence at all… right? 
Actually… 
Some clever fans have pointed out that a video Queen Bey posted at Christmas may have contained some hints at her condition. 
Photos: Other Celebs With Naked Pregnant Pics! 
In the slide show of festive photos, Blue Ivy Carter 's momma held up two fingers then a made a heart with her hands. Was she trying to tell us then?? 
(Some followers even say they can spot a bump, but we think Bey is hiding it pretty well even in that skintight dress…) 
Ch-ch-check out the vid (below) and decide for yourself! 
A video posted by Beyoncé (@beyonce) on Dec 17, 2016 at 8:05pm PST 
Hmm, that could have just been wishes for peace and love… but given what we now know… 
What do YOU think, Perezcious readers??
